queries.name: loss_ratio_liability
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
SELECT
  round(c.total_claims / p.total_premium, 2) AS loss_ratio
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      round(curr.total_premium, 0) as total_premium
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              pol_eff_date,
              pol_expiry_date,
              premium,
              round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active
            FROM
              policy
            WHERE
              pol_issue_date BETWEEN '{{ start_date }}'
              AND '{{ end_date }}'
          )
        WHERE
          months_active > 0
      ) curr
      JOIN (
        SELECT
          sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              pol_eff_date,
              pol_expiry_date,
              premium,
              round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active
            FROM
              policy
            WHERE
              pol_issue_date BETWEEN date_sub(
                '{{ start_date }}',
                datediff('{{ end_date }}', '{{ start_date }}')
              )
              AND date_sub(
                '{{ end_date }}',
                datediff('{{ end_date }}', '{{ start_date }}')
              )
          )
        WHERE
          months_active > 0
      ) prev
  ) p
  JOIN (
    SELECT
      round(curr.total_claims, 0) AS total_claims
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          sum(claim_amount_injury) AS total_claims
        FROM
          claim
        WHERE
          claim_date BETWEEN '{{ start_date }}'
          AND '{{ end_date }}'
      ) curr
  ) c;

queries.name: Claim - driverAge
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
select
  driver_age,
  count(*)
from
  claim_insights
where
  driver_age >= 14
  and driver_age < 110
GROUP BY
  driver_age
order by
  driver_age;

queries.name: Claims - Summary

title.text: Count of Incident Type by Severity

queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
select
  incident_type,
  incident_severity,
  count(incident_severity)
FROM
  claim_insights
where
  to_date(claim_date) > '{{start_date}}'
  and to_date(claim_date) < '{{end_date}}'
group by
  incident_type,
  incident_severity

queries.name: Claim - vehicleAge
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
select
  count(*),
  make,
  model_year
from
  claim_insights
group by
  make,
  model_year

queries.name: Claims - Frequency by Hour
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
select
  incident_hour,
  count(*) as incidents,
  sum(claim_amount_injury) as liability_amount,
  sum(claim_amount_property) + sum(claim_amount_vehicle) as property_amount
from
  claim
group by
  incident_hour
order by
  incident_hour;

queries.name: Claims - loss_ratio
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
SELECT
  round(c.total_claims / p.total_premium, 2) AS loss_ratio
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      round(curr.total_premium, 0) as total_premium
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              pol_eff_date,
              pol_expiry_date,
              premium,
              round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active
            FROM
              policy
            WHERE
              pol_issue_date BETWEEN '{{ start_date }}'
              AND '{{ end_date }}'
          )
        WHERE
          months_active > 0
      ) curr
      JOIN (
        SELECT
          sum(premium * months_active) AS total_premium
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              pol_eff_date,
              pol_expiry_date,
              premium,
              round(months_between(pol_expiry_date, pol_eff_date), 0) AS months_active
            FROM
              policy
            WHERE
              pol_issue_date BETWEEN date_sub(
                '{{ start_date }}',
                datediff('{{ end_date }}', '{{ start_date }}')
              )
              AND date_sub(
                '{{ end_date }}',
                datediff('{{ end_date }}', '{{ start_date }}')
              )
          )
        WHERE
          months_active > 0
      ) prev
  ) p
  JOIN (
    SELECT
      round(curr.total_claims, 0) AS total_claims
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          sum(claim_amount_total) AS total_claims
        FROM
          claim
        WHERE
          claim_date BETWEEN '{{ start_date }}'
          AND '{{ end_date }}'
      ) curr
  ) c;

queries.name: Claims - Damage - Property vs Liability vs Event Type
queries.query:
USE main.fsi_smart_claims;
select
  'liability damage' as type,
  incident_type,
  sum(claim_amount_injury) as amount
from
  claim_insights
where
  to_date(claim_date) >= '{{start_date}}'
  and to_date(claim_date) <= '{{end_date}}'
group by
  incident_type
UNION
select
  'property damage' as type,
  incident_type,
  sum(claim_amount_property) + sum(claim_amount_vehicle) as amount
from
  claim_insights
where
  to_date(claim_date) >= '{{start_date}}'
  and to_date(claim_date) <= '{{end_date}}'
group by
  incident_type
